title: Un piccolo dubbio..
body:
Salve ragazzi avrei una domanda da farvi, spero che qualcuno mi risponda ! :P Alcuni champ infliggono danni magici bonus con gli autoattack ( la prima che mi viene in mente perchè la sto spammando è elise XD ) e fin qui ok.
Volevo sapere se gli effetti degli item come rylai e liandry si applicano sull' autoattack nella forma ragno.
Grazie per la collaborazione!!

replies.body:
Estratto da: http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Rylai's_Crystal_Scepter

> The following will not trigger a slow:
Champion abilities that do not trigger spell vamp.
On-hit damage dealt by items.
Ignite.

Estratto da: http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Liandry's_Torment

> Most abilities which apply On-hit effects such as Infinite Duress.png Infinite Duress and Toxic Shot.png Toxic Shot will not trigger Liandry's Torment item.png Liandry's Torment. Also excluded are items with on-hit effects such as Wit's End item.png Wit's End and Nashor's Tooth item.png Nashor's Tooth.
There is a selection of abilities that apply on-hit effects that are still classified as spells and will trigger Liandry's Torment item.png Liandry's Torment. These abilities are generally area of effect and will trigger spell vamp. For example,  Righteous Fury.png Righteous Fury and Vorpal Spikes.png Vorpal Spikes.
Activated item effects (e.g. Hextech Gunblade item.png Hextech Gunblade) and Smite will also work.
This item's passive will not work with item passives which deal magic damage such as Thornmail item.png Thornmail, Sunfire Cape item.png Sunfire Cape and itself.


Spero ti risponda :)
